remarks: Domain of the least upper bound function of a poset.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Sep-2018.)
statement:
lubfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lubfval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lubfval.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
lubfval.p $e |- ( ps <-> ( A. y e. s y .<_ x /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. s y .<_ z -> x .<_ z ) ) ) $.
lubfval.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
lubdm $p |- ( ph -> dom U = { s e. ~P B | E! x e. B ps } ) $.
$d B s x z $.
$d K s x y z $.
